bibl.title: The Affairs of a Complex Family. SB XVI 12288.
bibl.note: Reedition of P. Berol. Inv. 13357 recto (= S.B. XVI, 12288), col. I, with addition of P. Berol. Inv. 21484 fr. B (= recto of B.G.U. XIII, 2280 fr. B). This column contains 2 texts, one concerned with the census of 173/4 (Arsinoe, 26/8/175), the other dealing with a renunciation of claim to an inheritance.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berol. Inv. 13357 recto + 21484 fr. B recto 145.4 B.G.U. XIII, 2280 fr. B
BAGNALL Roger S. and Klaas A. WORP, The Affairs of a Complex Family. SB XVI 12288.
ArchPF 40 (1994) pp. 37-41, 1 arbre généal. et fig. 17.

Reedition of P. Berol. Inv. 13357 recto (= S.B. XVI, 12288), col. I, with addition of P. Berol. Inv. 21484 fr. B (= recto of B.G.U. XIII, 2280 fr. B). This column contains 2 texts, one concerned with the census of 173/4 (Arsinoe, 26/8/175), the other dealing with a renunciation of claim to an inheritance.
